item.title: Azzia add a quote by Adam S. McHugh
item.description: "When introverts are in conflict with each other...it may require a map in order to follow all the silences, nonverbal cues and passive-aggressive behaviors!" -- Adam S. McHugh

item.title: Azzia add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "Deliver me from writers who say the way they live doesn't matter. I'm not sure a bad person can write a good book. If art doesn't make us better, then what on earth is it for." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Azzia add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Azzia add a quote by alice walker
item.description: "I think it pisses God off if you walk by the color purple in a field somewhere and don't notice it." -- alice walker

item.title: Azzia add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "Men make war to get attention. All killing is an expression of self-hate." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Azzia add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "Any God I ever found in church, I brought in myself." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Azzia add a quote by Alice Walker
item.description: "The nature of this flower is to bloom." -- Alice Walker

item.title: Azzia add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "I wish you'd help me look into a more interesting problem - namely, my sanity." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Azzia add a quote by Cheryl Strayed
item.description: "I had problems a therapist couldn't solve; grief that no man in a room could ameliorate." -- Cheryl Strayed

item.title: Azzia add a quote by Julie Schumacher
item.description: "Talking to a therapist, I thought, was like taking your clothes off and then taking your skin off, and then having the other person say, "Would you mind opening up your rib cage so that we can start?" -- Julie Schumacher

item.title: Azzia add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If I had an hour to solve a problem I'd spend 55 minutes thinking about the problem and 5 minutes thinking about solutions." -- Albert Einstein
